description:
NVIDIA has open-sourced KAI Scheduler, a Kubernetes solution designed to optimise the scheduling of GPU resources. The solution, previously a core component of the Run:ai platform, is now available to the wider community under the Apache 2.0 licence. According to NVIDIA, the move is part of its ongoing commitment to the advancement of both open-source... Read more »

The post KAI Scheduler: NVIDIA open-sources Kubernetes GPU scheduler appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: KAI Scheduler: NVIDIA open-sources Kubernetes GPU scheduler

The event will serve as a bridge between the Eastern and Western technology ecosystems and feature 180+ hours of expert insights from 220... Read more »

title: GITEX GLOBAL in Asia: the largest tech show in the world
